title: Constant Disconnection while Playing Ranked
body: Uhm... im playing ranked duo queue with my friend and a zed in my team and I as well as the other team's Jax are experiencing a constant disconnection.... this caused us to lose the game ..... what is happening? why arent there any heads up on this or does riot still havent been informed about this?.... is there a way that they could at least count the game is non-accountable because i lost a decent amount of LP in that game... -_- im a silver VI trying to climb the ladder... and this just... destroyed my night....

replies.body: just got placed in low priority queue for this bs, so f*cked
